thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay at hotel Artemide
thread.title_full: Lovely stay at hotel Artemide - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: jillyjames2017
title: Lovely stay at hotel Artemide
text: We booked this hotel for a short break because of all the wonderful reviews on trip advisor. The hotel lived up to expectations. It is very clean and modern and the hotel staff were very friendly and polite. We had an issue with the hotel restaurant on our first night so they did not charge us for the meal and said they would try to improve the vegan options on the menu. The breakfasts at the hotel were also very good and the waiting staff very helpful and pleasant. I would recommend this hotel if staying in Rome.
